text:
Hello [redacted_name]
Thank you so much for the invite,
But please can we make it to next Friday?
This is because [redacted_name] has traveled for work and will come back next week. If I get to eat Spanish dishes without him he will be pissed ğŸ˜‚
By the way he bought us a book to learn Spanish quick and I have learned a few words already
Canâ€™t wait to practice with you and try Spanish food tooğŸ˜‹
Much appreciate your invite
Have a great night
